verbose_text: Sphingosine-1-phosphate (S1P) and EBI2 (GPR183) both have been shown to direct 33D1+ DCs to the bridging channel; disruption of either by pharmacological inhibitors or genetic deletion impairs DC organization and capture of particulate antigen from the bloodstream.
evidence: Sphingosine-1-phosphate (S1P) and EBI2 (GPR183) both have been shown to direct 33D1+ DCs
